chat.empty: Chat is empty. Start a conversation to see content here.

audio.noData: No audio stream received from API.

files.createFailed: Could not create target file at {{path}}: {{error}}
files.formatFailed: Failed to format document after task operation

tasks.insertOutOfBounds: Cannot insert task at index {{index}}: Index out of bounds (document has {{total}} items)
tasks.multipleFound: Multiple tasks found with description "{{task}}" in {{path}}. Please make your task description more specific.
tasks.notFound: To-do item "{{task}}" not found in {{path}}. If the task is in another file, please specify it in the file_path parameter.

tts.invalidVoice: Invalid voice selected: {{voice}}. Please choose a valid voice.

microphone.accessDenied: Microphone access denied. Please allow microphone access in your browser settings.
microphone.inUse: Cannot access microphone. It might be in use by another application.
microphone.notFound: No microphone found. Please connect a microphone and try again.

tts.noApiKey: OpenAI API Key not set. Please configure it in settings for text-to-speech.

checkUpdates.desc: Check if there's a newer version of Life Navigator available and download it automatically.
checkUpdates.name: Check for Updates

createStarterKit.desc: Create a new starter kit with pre-configured AI modes and templates to get you started quickly.
createStarterKit.name: Create Starter Kit

resetTutorial.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the tutorial? This will show the setup screens again next time you open Life Navigator.
resetTutorial.desc: Reset the setup tutorial and onboarding flow. This will show the setup screens again next time you open Life Navigator.
resetTutorial.name: Reset Tutorial

viewDocs.desc: Open the Life Navigator user guide and documentation on GitHub in your browser.
viewDocs.name: View Documentation

apiKeys.anthropicDesc: Your Anthropic API key for the main AI assistant functionality. Get it from Anthropic Console.
apiKeys.firecrawlDesc: Your Firecrawl API key for deep research functionality. Get it from Firecrawl Dashboard.
apiKeys.openaiDesc: Your OpenAI API key for text-to-speech functionality. Get it from OpenAI Platform.
apiKeys.securityNote: Important: Your API key is stored in your Obsidian config folder. Do not share your vault or config folder with others if you store your API key here.
apiKeys.title: API Keys

prompts.defaultPrompt:
# Domain
A message or voice command issued by the user to the AI assistant.

# Examples
- Check off task ... umm ... I took out the trash
- I made dinner
- Add for tomorrow to remind me to reach out to John.

# Glossary
[[ln-currently-open-file]] ðŸ”Ž
[[ln-current-chat]] ðŸ”Ž

Start of transcription:
prompts.speechToTextPromptDesc: The prompt that will be sent to the speech-to-text engine. This provides context to the AI model. You can use link expansion.

findFilesByTag.failed: Failed to find files with tag {{tag}}

errors.aborted: Research operation was cancelled by user
errors.noApiKey: Firecrawl API Key not set. Please configure it in settings for deep research functionality.
errors.noResults: No relevant information found for the given query.
errors.quotaExceeded: Firecrawl API quota exceeded. Please check your billing and usage limits.
errors.timeout: Research request timed out. Please try with a more specific query.

result.message: Successfully conducted deep research on "{{query}}" and saved report to {{path}}. Research included {{sourceCount}} sources with {{maxDepth}} depth iterations.

results.limitedResults: Results limited to {{maxResults}} files. There may be more files with this tag.

errors.aborted: Image generation was cancelled by user
errors.fileExists: File already exists at {{path}}. Please choose a different path or delete the existing file.
errors.noApiKey: OpenAI API Key not set. Please configure it in settings for image generation.
errors.noBase64Data: Invalid image data format received from OpenAI API
errors.noImageData: No image data received from OpenAI API
errors.quotaExceeded: OpenAI API quota exceeded. Please check your billing and usage limits.

handover.alreadyInMode: Already in {{modeName}} mode. No change needed.
handover.handoverInstructions: You have been handed control of this conversation. Please continue executing the user's task using your specialized capabilities and personality. Take over from here and provide appropriate assistance based on your mode's purpose.
handover.invalidModeId: Mode ID is required and must be a string
handover.newModeActive: You are now operating as {{modeName}} mode.

downloadTranscript.success: Successfully downloaded YouTube transcript to {{path}}. Contains {{segments}} segments covering approximately {{duration}} minutes of video content.

modal.reloadRequiredMessageWithVersions:
Plugin updated from version {{currentVersion}} to {{latestVersion}}.
Would you like to restart Obsidian to apply changes?

files.noFrontmatter: File {{filename}} has no frontmatter, using defaults with file content as system prompt

anthropicKey.description: Anthropic Claude powers the main AI functionality. You'll need an API key to continue.
anthropicKey.placeholder: Paste your Anthropic API key here
anthropicKey.title: Configure Anthropic API Key

language.description: Life Navigator works best when your Obsidian interface language matches the language you write your notes in. Select your preferred language below - if it's different from your current setting, Obsidian will restart automatically to apply the change. Voice features (speech-to-text and text-to-speech) will automatically use your selected language.
language.manualRestart: Please restart Obsidian to apply the language changes.
language.note: If you select a different language than currently configured, Obsidian will automatically restart to apply the changes. All Life Navigator content, AI interactions, and starter kit files will then be in your selected language. Voice features will automatically work in your chosen language.
language.title: Configure Language

openaiKey.description: OpenAI powers voice features like text-to-speech. This is optional but recommended.
openaiKey.note: You can always add this later in settings to enable voice features.
openaiKey.placeholder: Paste your OpenAI API key here
openaiKey.title: Configure OpenAI API Key

starterKit.description: Get started by creating your starter kit with pre-configured AI modes and templates.
starterKit.title: Welcome to Life Navigator

starterKit.noModes:
## Welcome to Life Navigator

To get started, create a starter kit containing basic modes with the _#ln-mode_ tag.
